const contieneAmex = (cd) => /^3[47][0-9]{13}$/.test(cd);

/372270528621655/
/372433990518694/
/379081572821084/
/349495819452956/
/347107928811494/
/348344336990062/
/377792175673705/
/375219998068517/
/370935846273304/
/372055376380420/

const contieneMastercard = (cd) => /^(5[1-5][0-9]{14}|2(22[1-9][0-9]{12}|2[3-9][0-9]{13}|[3-6][0-9]{14}|7[0-1][0-9]{13}|720[0-9]{12}))$/.test(cd);

/5395878452556803/
/2509341780132954/
/2704233506275637/
/2645717007930266/
/2228268026845110/
/2316381187566332/
/2227356782958908/
/5519940839927048/
/2720728700300998/
/2445571805953933/

const contieneVisaCard = (cd) => /^4[0-9]{12}(?:[0-9]{3})?$/.test(cd);

/4696850116690/
/4949448947002921/
/4391017042455/
/4778871816701803/
/4644385824164891/
/4529911410221/
/4821858003879/
/4737204633290116/
/4460396761992117/
/4797255619109/

const contieneVisaMasterCard = (cd) => /^(?:4[0-9]{12}(?:[0-9]{3})?|5[1-5][0-9]{14})$/.test(cd);

/4347761782558805/
/5466250186119758/
/4000887655671648/
/4231052759921/
/5213021154238140/
/4680213842614702/
/5543599791150551/
/5472673198630749/
/4299570169991/
/5479487433930972/
